snippet: Guest blogger Takayuki Nishi argues that China contradicts itself when it claims that the Senkaku/Diaoyu Islands are inherently Chinese territory.
abstract: Guest blogger Takayuki Nishi argues that China contradicts itself when it claims that the Senkaku/Diaoyu Islands are inherently Chinese territory.

headline.main: The Diaoyu/Senkaku Islands: A Japanese Scholar Responds
